name: tailscale-mcp
description: Comprehensive Tailscale MCP server with 10 portmanteau tools and 74 operations
long_description: Professional Tailscale MCP server providing comprehensive network management, monitoring, and automation capabilities. Features 10 portmanteau tools covering device management, network operations, monitoring, file sharing, security, automation, backup, performance, reporting, and integrations.

api_key.title: Tailscale API Key
api_key.description: Your Tailscale API key for authentication (stored securely)

tools.name: tailscale_device
tools.description: Comprehensive device management (15 operations): list, get, authorize, rename, tag, SSH, search, stats, exit nodes, subnet routing, user management, auth keys

tools.name: tailscale_network
tools.description: DNS and network management (9 operations): MagicDNS, DNS records, resolution, policies, statistics

tools.name: tailscale_monitor
tools.description: Monitoring and metrics (6 operations): status, Prometheus metrics, topology, health reports, Grafana dashboards

tools.name: tailscale_file
tools.description: File sharing via Taildrop (6 operations): send, receive, transfer management, statistics

tools.name: tailscale_security
tools.description: Security and compliance (8 operations): scanning, auditing, threat detection, policy management, alerting

tools.name: tailscale_automation
tools.description: Workflow automation (6 operations): workflows, scripts, batch operations, scheduling

tools.name: tailscale_backup
tools.description: Backup and disaster recovery (6 operations): backup creation, restoration, scheduling, testing

tools.name: tailscale_performance
tools.description: Performance monitoring (6 operations): latency, bandwidth, optimization, capacity planning

tools.name: tailscale_reporting
tools.description: Advanced reporting (6 operations): custom reports, analytics, scheduling, export

tools.name: tailscale_integration
tools.description: Third-party integrations (6 operations): webhooks, Slack, Discord, PagerDuty, Datadog

prompts.name: device_management
prompts.text: Perform ${arguments.operation} on Tailscale device ${arguments.device_id} with name '${arguments.name}' and tags ${arguments.tags}. Provide comprehensive device management capabilities.

prompts.name: network_management
prompts.description: Configure Tailscale network and DNS settings
prompts.text: Configure Tailscale network with ${arguments.operation} for domain ${arguments.domain} and DNS records ${arguments.records}. Manage MagicDNS and network policies.

prompts.name: monitoring_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze Tailscale network health and performance
prompts.text: Analyze Tailscale network health for ${arguments.timeframe} with focus on ${arguments.metrics} and alert on ${arguments.alerts}. Provide comprehensive monitoring insights.
